layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x140
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x140
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x109
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 164x18
          text run at (0,0) width 164: "It should say \"HI\" below:"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (15,34) size 165x75 [color=#FFFFFF] [bgcolor=#000080]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 165x45
          text run at (0,0) width 165: "xx xx xx xx"
          text run at (0,15) width 165: "xx xx xx xx"
          text run at (0,30) width 45: "xx "
        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 165x30
          LayoutText {#text} at (90,30) size 165x30
            text run at (90,30) width 75: "xx xx"
            text run at (0,45) width 165: "xx xx xx xx"
